H0.text: What type of whale was Moby Dick. Sperm Whale

H1.text: What type of whale was Moby Dick. Humpback Whale

H2.text: What type of whale was Moby Dick. Orca

H3.text: What type of whale was Moby Dick. Potvis

A4.text: Moby Dick is a fictional white sperm whale

A5.text: Melville based the whale on an albino whale of that period, Mocha Dick
